root.name: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
root.description: Star Wars: Attack of the Clones is a video game based on the movie of the same name. Battle as Anakin Skywalker while using the force to crush enemies.Battle your way through eleven action packed levels such as Tatooine, Coruscant, and Geonosis, while playing as Obi-Wan Kenobi, Mace Windu, and Anakin Skywalker. Battle enemies such as Count Dooku, Jango Fett, and the evil CIS. (Confederacy of Independant Systems) Players can also compete in races, ride in vehicles, and take part in epic space battles.
